TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputLanguageManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputLanguageManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供用于管理 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中的输入语言的工具。

span.span: Provides facilities for managing input languages in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 "区域和语言选项" 控制面板注册其他语言。Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel. 在 "语言" 选项卡中，选择 "文本服务和输入语言"，然后单击 "详细信息" 按钮以注册其他语言。From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages. 将显示以下对话框。The following dialog appears. ![“文字服务和输入语言”对话框。](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "“文字服务和输入语言”对话框。")![Text services and input languages dialog.](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.") ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 设置元素的输入语言 。The following example demonstrates how to use an to set the input language of a element. [!code-csharp[languageManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/languageManager/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[languageManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/languageManager/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)]

span.span: An enumerator for currently available input languages, or if no input languages are available.
This property has no default value.

summary.span: 获取或设置关联的依赖对象的首选输入语言。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred input language for the associated dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| 当关联的依赖项对象接收输入焦点时，将自动选择此附加属性指定的输入语言。When the associated dependency object receives the input focus, the input language specified by this attached property is selected automatically.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在关联依赖对象失去输入焦点时还原先前活动的输入语言。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether or not the previously active input language should be restored when the associated dependency object looses the input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| 如果 附加属性在关联的依赖项对象上不可用，则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the attached property is not available on the associated dependency object.
